captions.text:
- HELLO, AND WELCOME
TO THE FIFTH ANNUAL MEETING

- LAST NOVEMBER, BARACK OBAMA
WAS RE-ELECTED PRESIDENT,

AND THE BLACK VOTE
WENT ALMOST ENTIRELY TO HIM!

- WE'RE NOT GETTING
OUR MESSAGE OUT, OBVIOUSLY.

THE REPUBLICAN PARTY
IS AND SHOULD BE

THE ONLY HOME FOR BLACK VOTES.
- YES, SIR.

- NOW, PEOPLE THINK THAT
BLACK VOTERS ARE A MONOLITH.

ARE AN EXTREMELY DIVERSE
GROUP OF PEOPLE.

NOW, TO SPEAK MORE
ON DIVERSITY,

- NOW, I'M NOT GONNA
SUGARCOAT IT, I'M PISSED!

THE LIBERAL MEDIA
THINKS THAT REPUBLICANISM

IS NOT FOR BLACK PEOPLE.
all: MM.

- NOW, YOU TELL ME, WHAT
ABOUT FISCAL RESPONSIBILITY,

A STRONG NATIONAL DEFENSE,
AND A LIMITED GOVERNMENT

WE'RE NOT A MONOLITH!
all: MM-MMM.

- WE COME IN ALL DIFFERENT
SHAPES AND SIZES.

- NOW, WHO HERE WOULD LIKE
TO COME UP TO THIS PODIUM

AND SPEAK ABOUT THE DIVERSITY
AMONGST BLACK REPUBLICANS?

GENTLEMEN,
WE HAVE A REAL TREAT TODAY,

A GENTLEMAN
WHO IS A LITTLE BIT ECCENTRIC,

A LITTLE BIT OUTSIDE OF THE BOX,
IF YOU WILL,

BUT I CAN'T THINK
OF A BETTER PERSON TO SPEAK

ALL THE WAY FROM ORLANDO,
MY GOOD FRIEND,

IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU.
IT'S GOOD TO SEE YOU.

- THANK YOU FOR BEING HERE,
BROTHER ARTHUR.

- DEMOCRATS THINK
THEY HAVE THE RIGHT
BUT THAT IS NOT THE CASE.

WE ARE NOT A MONOLITH.
[crowd murmuring agreement]

DEMOCRATS MAY BE COOL,
BUT THEY AIN'T PRACTICAL.

COME TO THINK OF IT...
- GET THOSE PANTS.

- I THINK BLACK REPUBLICANS
ARE PRETTY COOL.

[crowd murmuring agreement]
- HEAR, HEAR, HEAR, HEAR.

- EXCUSE ME, GENTLEMEN.
SORRY TO INTERRUPT.

SOMEONE'S WHITE WIFE
IS HERE TO PICK THEM UP.

- UH, SHE WAS WHITE.
- OH, GREAT, THAT'S--

comments.author: Meirstein

comments.text:
Sooo This whole argument in the comments is stupid. I've been called racist 
because i thought one person who was mocking two cops who got shot was a 
horrible person. to me laughing, and mocking someone who is hurt and cannot 
defend them selves is despicable, petty, and just plane horrible. was the 
woman black? yes, have i ever once in my life cared about someones skin 
color? no, one of my dads closest friends who helped raze me was black, one 
of my very best most trusted friends is black. so being called racist for 
not agreeing with someone because they are a different skin color makes no 
sense to me.  Now for everyone here let me Quote from the Dictionary what 
racism means "the belief that all members of each race possess 
characteristics or abilities specific to that race, especially so as to 
distinguish it as inferior or superior to another race or races."

Now the definition being said, Disagreeing with someone who has a different 
color of skin is not Racist, Going out of your way to harm, put down, or 
diminish a person or persons life, because they are a different color skin 
then you are IS RACIST. I did this because maybe people who use the word 
will learn what it means and use it in a better manner, instead of throwing 
it down like a Win all argument.

Now a word that Keeps getting thrown around is Ignorant. as above here is 
the Definition of Ignorant "lacking knowledge or awareness in general; 
uneducated or unsophisticated."  So again disagreeing with who is on the 
opposite side is not Ignorant. if they are able to put of facts and Actual 
talking points to back there argument up then they are not ignorant, If 
they are only calling names and trying to bully people into shutting up, 
Those people are Ignorant because they do not show any signs of 
intelligence besides calling names.

Ok, My views on Both political parties.  It's simple, Both sides are 
MAJORLY FLAWED.
People say that all republicans Hate gay marrage, thats simply not true, 
Not ALL republicans hate gay marrage. Allot do, that is true, but allot 
really just dont give a crap what two people do in there own home, they 
just dont want it in there face.

NOW, in your face to me is when people go out of their way to do something 
that they know will piss someone off. Just being seen holding hands or a 
light kiss is not IN YOUR FACE. same with religious people (yes i have to 
bring this up, its on my mind, sorry) just cus someone says grace before 
eating their food is not in your face, being religious is not in your face, 
going to school and being religious is not in your GOD DAMN FACE! gah. 
Fucking bring the bible to school, who cares its your book, bring the 
Quran, why does anyone care? how i see it is they see any sign of religion, 
its that religious person trying to stuff there religion down there 
throats, when their not! stuffing religion down your throat is when You go 
up to someone, tell them they are immoral, tellt hem they need Jesus or 
Allah or they are going to hell. that is shoving it down your throat. Now 
To all ATHEISTS who go out of there way to tell religious people they are 
stupid, wrong, insane, and what ever else you can think of, YOU ARE BEING A 
HYPOCRITE, YOU are shoving ATHEISM DOWN PEOPLES THROATS, and your being a 
dick.  also fyi im not even religious, i just believe everyone should have 
the freedom to believe what ever the hell they want.

but back to the main point, personally I couldn't care less if a person was 
gay or not, i just do not want anyone to Go full PDA in my face, no matter 
there straight or gay, it weirds me out.

Abortion, I am not for it. My reason, My mother had an abortion 2 years 
before i was born and she threatened to abort me. Now before i knew that 
information about my past I did not care if people got an abortion, it was 
"well it doesn't affect me so why should i care?" and after knowing that 
information all i know now is I do not have a sibling i could have had, and 
i almost was not given the right to live. Personally I like living. so My 
personal opinion is should people get an abortion? No. will i tell people 
they are horrible people for getting one? No. I think if you want an 
abortion, at least Really think before you act, because you could be 
depriving the world of the next Martin Luther King Jr. Or the next Einstein.

Weed, In excess it can be bad, but in moderation who gives a crap. Should 
you be allowed to drive stoned? I don't think that is a good idea, so i 
would say no. should it be legal? has it killed anyone yet? No. what has 
weed done? brought in money to the government, and given a hell of allot of 
people the munchies. so do i think it should be legal, If alcohol is legal 
i think weed should be too.

Taxation/minimum wage, Personally id like it if less taxes were taken out 
of my paycheck. but here is what i know and i could be wrong. but when you 
print more money then what the item that is backing the money is worth, 
then what each individual piece of money is worth, is now worth less then 
before. If im not mistaken its called Inflation(again i could be wrong on 
that.)  so with that information in mind if it is correct, then i believe 
that the government shouldn't raze the minimum wage, i think that the 
government should stop  printing money, stop spending on allot of really 
useless stuff like those stupid light intersection speed traps. and focus 
on Rebuilding what once was great about this country. how they should do 
that? I honestly do not know, but i think they should come up with some 
way. 

I do not like Obama's politics, i do not like Bush's. there are allot of 
things i wish Obama Had done better. that is my view on our president. 

Now you're probably wondering why i wrote all this, well its simple. I want 
to honestly know more, I want to get out all the things that i think are 
right and maybe correct them if they are wrong, and to vent because if i 
vented like this to all of my friends then hell i wouldn't have friends. do 
i think the republicans are worse then the democrats?  i honestly dont. but 
i do think that both sides have allot of things i do not agree with, 
Republicans and Gay Marriage, Democrats and Abortion. There is plenty more 
but that's kinda the sum of it.  also sorry for the grammar, if grammar is 
your argument and or what ever then, you really suck at Civil arguments 
because that is what you pick to argue about, when iv named a few good 
talking point up head.

If you want to comment, go ahead, Just try to keep it Civil :) ﻿

If you gotta choose one of the two parties republican is definitely not the 
way to go if you don't already have millions in the bank. Their policies 
consistently make it harder for the middle class and poor to succeed and 
move past their station and essentially creates a system of kings and surfs 
where one must be born into money to ever hope to make it in life. They are 
not for the free market they are for crony capitalism. They are a case 
study in cognitive dissonance pretending falsehoods are facts and labeling 
facts as heresy as if they are something to be debated like climate change. 
If you vote republicans you cast a shadow of doom over everything this 
country is supposed to stand for﻿
